instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the file structure: /app/frontend for React code, /app/backend for FastAPI.
Use 'recharts' for data visualization (Radar charts, Area charts).
Ensure the dashboard is dense but readable. Use col-span logic from Bento Grid Mode B.
Implement the 'Company Detail Page' with tabs: Overview, Enrichment, Scoring, Memo, Competitors.
Use the 'user_avatar_female' for the logged-in user profile.
Use 'tech_abstract_bg' for the pitch deck upload area background (with overlay).
Strictly adhere to the color palette. No random hex codes.
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
Do not use generic gradients. Use the defined palette.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable within content sections, but keep dashboard widgets dense.
Subtle grain textures/noise overlays are encouraged.
